tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    health_condition VARCHAR(50),
    date_admitted DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE health_conditions (
  condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  condition_name VARCHAR(50),
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE HealthConditions (
    condition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Demographics (
    demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    education_level VARCHAR(50),
    occupation VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
 patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 first_name VARCHAR(50),
 last_name VARCHAR(50),
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Conditions (
 condition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
 condition_name VARCHAR(100),
 diagnosis_date DATE,
 treatment VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE Demographics (
 demographic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
 ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
 language VARCHAR(50),
 occupation VARCHAR(50),
 marital_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (
 doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
 specialty VARCHAR(50),
 location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE PatientDemographics (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthConditions (
    condition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    condition_name VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    treatment VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE PatientAddresses (
    address_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    address_line VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    zipcode VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE DemographicsAnalysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    demographic_category VARCHAR(50),
    total_count INT,
    average_age FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE HealthConditionsAnalysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    condition_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_cases INT,
    recovery_rate FLOAT
)
